channel.title: Simple (?) Logo Request
channel.description:
Hey, just thought I'd request a logo for my new site in case anyone was kind enough to help out :)
The website is www.notfrank.com, and the graphic needed is the logo in the top left (currently my themes logo "SoftMC Blue"). The graphic must remain the same height, however can go as wide as needed, really.
There are two choices as to how I would like it to look. Ideally, it would incorporate some feature of the www.talktofrank.com logo, not just a copy and paste, but something that people can look at and think "that looks like that other sites logo, sorta" - this would work, because we are the anti-talktofrank. :)
However, I realise that this is probably difficult to pull off, and therefore will be happy with any kind of logo that fits with the colour scheme.
Anyone willing to help?
